This app will paint the image into the artistic style you want or to style of some world famous painting. Please follow these steps to operate the app - 
 
 1. Select the painting style of your wish from the available styles by pressing the button on top. Default style is "CRAYONS". 
 2. Select the image from gallery by pressing button at bottom "SELECT IMAGE AND SEE THE MAGIC". 
 3. Thats it, you will see the selected image in your selected style !! Now TAP on the gererated image to save it in gallery. 
 4. You can also view the selected image in different styles by toggling the style on the top!!

Some hints for what style you must select for image - 
 
 
 1. Use app generally for Scenery Images 
 
 2. To see how child would have drawn painting, use "CRAYONS" 
 
 2. To check how image looks if painted considering snowy weather, select "WATER WAVES" 
 
 3. If you are sensitive about sharp edges, use "WASSILY KANDINSKY" ! 
 
 4. To get feel of ghostly night, select "STARRY NIGHT"
